C

casByReference(Monitor<Value>) - Method in class com.github.vfro.Sandbox
Compare monitor`s value with the sandbox value by reference and set it to monitor if the reference is the same.
casByValue(Monitor<Value>) - Method in class com.github.vfro.Sandbox
Compare monitor`s value with the sandbox value by value and set it to monitor if the value is the same.

Clone Sandbox.
com.github.vfro - package com.github.vfro
Implementation of a Monitor Concurrency pattern.

M

Monitor can be used for concurrent access to a value.

P

pull(Monitor<Value>) - Method in class com.github.vfro.Sandbox
Obtain value from the monitor, assign its clone to sandbox and return the clone of obtained value.

R

Access monitored value for read (in shared mode).
readAccess(Consumer<Value>, Predicate<Value>) - Method in class com.github.vfro.Monitor
Causes current thread to wait until monitor becomes to some certain state and access monitored value for read (in shared mode).
readAccess(Consumer<Value>, Predicate<Value>, long, TimeUnit) - Method in class com.github.vfro.Monitor
Causes current thread to wait until monitor becomes to some certain state and access monitored value for read (in shared mode).
